page.title: 17TWIN TOWN: FEIGNES
page.content: Twinning is a linking of two communities of different nationalities and producing relationships between different villages in different countries. Keyworth has been twinned with Feignes (pronounced Fain-yee) since 1977. Feignes is a small town in northern France near the Belgian border, about one hours drive from Brussels. It is a similar size to Keyworth, with a large market square, overlooked by the Town Hall and the "Salle de Fete" which is used for social gatherings e.g, art exhibitions etc. When I went on a visit to Feignes we went to a disco with our French friends. We also went shopping to the hypermarket. It is good fun on a French exchange.
